title: Bank of Nova Scotia Breaks Above 200-Day Moving Average - Bullish for BNS - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Wednesday, shares of Bank of Nova Scotia Halifax (Symbol: BNS) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $53.58, changing hands as high as $53.68 per share. Bank of Nova Scotia Halifax shares are currently trading up about 1.7% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of BNS shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
